```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(usethis)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

find derivative expression and slope for each function
```{r}
df_dx <- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)

```

```{r}
dp_da <- D(expr = expression(2*(3*a+2)^4-5), name = "a")
a <- 1.2
eval(dp_da)

```

create plot of penguin bill length versus bill depth
```{r}
ggplot(data=penguins, aes(x=bill_length_mm, y=bill_depth_mm))+
  geom_point(aes(color=species))+
  labs(x="Penguin Bill Length (cm)",
       y="Penguin Bill Depth (cm)",
       title = "Penguin bill length versus bill depth")

head(penguins)

```

jitter plot
```{r}
ggplot(data=penguins, aes(x=species, y=flipper_length_mm))+
  geom_jitter(aes(color=species))+
  labs(y="Flipper length (cm)",
       title = "Flipper length by species")

```
